website_summaries.verdict: Your best option if you're looking for an affordable, lightweight hiking boot that will hold up well over time.
pros: Very lightweight but sturdy and comfortable
Keeps feet dry and warm in all weather
cons: Tends to run small and narrow, so consider ordering a size up

customer_reviews.title: WEAR
customer_reviews.text: These were comfortable from the first day; Vasque has that reputation. I have worn them only on gravel roads so far, but anticipate they will serve me well on day hikes in the mountains. I got a C/D width because I have a bunion, so am especially pleased with the comfort. I am giving four stars only because I cannot rate their durability, since they are new. In a few years, they might be five star. After number of months, I give this five stars. They continue to be comfortable. I wear them to teach classes when the weather is bad, I wore them to snowshoe a 5K fundraiser. I have changed the rating from 4 to 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Run VERY small!!!
customer_reviews.text: These boots run super small and narrow. I ordered the wide just to be safe, and they were still too tight. Also there is barely any padding to the sole. Very uncomfortable just walking around the house. Couldn't imagine hiking in them! Returned for refund the very next day I received them.
customer_reviews.author: T.Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Laces hook snapped on first hike!
customer_reviews.text: I wore these hiking for the first time since receiving them, and only a little into the hike (about 15 minutes) the upper hook for the laces snapped off without warning. Laces were not tied with extra pressure, merely regular pressure. Very disappointed in such a defective pair, have reached out to Amazon about a refund/return as I will not be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: sophie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit from day 1, still going strong after a year of heavy use
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots! I was weary of purchasing hiking boots online because I have small (size 7) feet that are pretty wide, which makes it hard for me to find shoes that fit right. These were on sale on PrimeDay and I desperately needed a pair of hiking boots so I went for it. So worth it!! Boots fit perfectly since day 1, no need to break them in, no blisters, no tight fit despite me having wide feet. I've used these for over a year now, virtually every day. I work with kids outdoors, which means I need to have comfortable hiking footwear that can handle all types of weather. Love these boots, absolutely worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: IMFO

customer_reviews.title: My Problem Feet Not a Good Fit Unfortunately.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love these boots but the shoe last just doesn't fit my foot well. They look well made and are lighter weight, just wish they still made suede/leather and goretex boots with vibrate soles. Oh well continuing my quest to find the perfect day hiking boot for me. Also, please boot manufacturers make some zero drop boots and boots which accommodate toe splay.
customer_reviews.author: sweet-p

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable boot
customer_reviews.text: One of the nicest hiking boots I’ve worn. Comfortable from the first hike, very lightweight. They are waterproof but not Goretex, so may be a bit warm in summer. I’ll test them out on the Continental Divide Trail in Colorado this summer. I ordered 1/2 size larger than my normal size, and the fit is just right. Vasque always has great boots.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia I. Maynard

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: I wear size 9 and I have another pair of Vasque in size 10,5 which in my opinion a bit to large for me but a guy who sold it to me insisted that how much space I should have. So I decided to buy this pair in 10 and I think it more tight than 9s I usually wear. So will have to return.
customer_reviews.author: anna

customer_reviews.title: Ready to Wear Out of Box
customer_reviews.text: I wore these right out of the box on day hikes in Arizona mountains (Grand Canyon and Camelback). I had no issues not having broken them in beforehand and wore them for a full day of walking and hiking. I sized up one full size and felt this allowed enough room to stay comfortable as feet expanded during a long day of hiking. They offered great support and were worth finally buying true hiking shoes instead of using running shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: In love
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these boots!! I've always had issues finding a boot that fits well. I have a narrow heel and an average toe box. These boots run a bit small on the small size. Typically I wear a size 6 in street shoes, but I needed a 7 in these. They're super comfortable right out of the box. I can walk through puddles and water without worring. I can't speak to their durability since ai havent put very many miles on them yet, but I can't wait to get out on the trails!!
customer_reviews.author: Kai

customer_reviews.title: Love my Vasque hiking boots
customer_reviews.text: Love my Vasque hiking boots! They broke in painlessly from day one. They're light and seem to be reasonably durable. My only complaint is that the outside material on the toe of the boots is wearing away and shows all kinds of scratch marks, but the structure of the boot itself is just fine! And the ankle support is fantastic! My ankle pops every time I walk uphill in normal shoes, and these boots completely solve that issue.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Smith

customer_reviews.title: Immediate Comfort!
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable hiking boots right out of the box! I ordered a 9 since I'm usually an 8.5-9, and they work wonderfully with a thick sock. I love the color, and constantly get compliments on them. They were a great deal for Vasque, a trusted name, and I bought them for less than $100. Warm in the winter with a smartwool sock, but I imagine they'll be airy enough in the spring/summer with a lighter liner.
customer_reviews.author: kelly

customer_reviews.title: Just disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: I'm really disappointed in these based on the reviews. I've worn these several times now, and each time I've done a hike with even a slight incline I've developed blisters on my heels. I'm a fairly regular hiker, and I previously wore Lowas with absolutely no trouble ever. With these, I've tried wearing thicker socks, have tried several pieces of advice on how to better tie the laces, and have given them a substantial grace period for "breaking in." It's been several hikes now, and I'm really disappointed to say that I can't justify wearing these ever again.
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: these are excellent! No issues breaking them in at all
customer_reviews.text: Very active hiker in Arizona and didn't want to spend a ton on a new pair of boots. For the price, these are excellent! No issues breaking them in at all. The only thing about the waterproof is that if you are in hot weather like AZ and your feet sweat a lot your toes will be really prune-y when you take them off as they don't breathe a whole lot. For 2-3 hours of use though, not bad at all!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect waterproof boot
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots! This is my second pair I love them so much. I work for my local Humane Society and travel by foot over difficult terrain and in every temperature or weather possible. These boots saved my feet last winter, hence I ordered another pair for work and may order another pair for what they are meant for (another passion of mine), hiking. I highly recommend this boot and this brand. I am sold for life!
customer_reviews.author: J. Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Great all-around hiking boots
customer_reviews.text: Great all-around hiking shoes. Saw these recommended as easy to break in (I never really had to-- easily went into several-hour long hikes without any blisters or issues), light weight, reasonable price. They fit the bill! Waterproof-tested and got banged up over a week of hiking; my feet stayed dry and issue-free and the shoes held up perfectly. Highly recommend. I ordered one size up (usually an 8.5/9 but ordered 9.5) and they fit nicely with a good hiking sock.
customer_reviews.author: Book Lover

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Hiking Boot!
customer_reviews.text: I am not an avid hiker, but do enjoy nature walks and needed a comfortable/light weight hiking boot for our trip to Alaska. This boot is light weight enough that even after all day hiking, my feet where not sore and aching all over. The back fits more like an athletic shoe, yet gives you the support you need through various terrain. Also my feet where still dry after walking through several streams of water.
customer_reviews.author: simplecitygirl

customer_reviews.title: Great so far!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shoes! I got them for a hike I will be taking this weekend, so if I can figure out how to I will update post hike. But at home, they feel super comfortable and they have excellent ankle support. It also doesn't feel like I will be breaking them in, they are so soft and comfortable on the inside. The quality is super. I got these based on recommendation from Outdoor Gear Lab.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Kap

customer_reviews.title: Paint at toe wore off and sole is too thin
customer_reviews.text: I bought these boots almost two years ago but have only worn them about 6 times (I don't go hiking as much as I would like). As shown in the photo, the paint on the leather by the toes wore off easily. Also, the sole is too thin; I can feel every rock on the trail. These boots were a big disappointment as my last pair of hiking boots were Vasque and were wonderful; they were of much superior quality. I have bought Vasque because I have narrow feet and they fit. Now I have to find other narrow hiking boots!
customer_reviews.author: Margems

customer_reviews.title: They are great! I like that they offer for wide foot ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes for my honeymoon trip to Iceland. I also bought the same style for men for my husband. They are great! I like that they offer for wide foot people! We went through all kinds of terrains mud, sharp rocks, under waterfalls, in water, and Snow! The only time it got wet was the top part of the shoe only because we were walking in high waters and the shoe wasn't high enough. The only issue i had was my shoe lace kept untying. Even when i double knot them it still unraveled. My husbands laces didn't. But i enjoyed them!
customer_reviews.author: Dar A.

customer_reviews.title: I love these hiking shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I am SO happy with these shoes! I went to REI to try them on and they were by far the most comfortable with adequate support and not too heavy. I bought them for 4 day Inca Trail hike and my feet were so comfortable, not one blister or one ache, and no sprained ankles! Felt like I was wearing sneakers the whole time. Highly recommend !!
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Fan of the Vasque brand; but not these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Had to return these as they just felt cheap! I love the Vasque Inhaler and used to love the Vasque Breeze so I hoped that I would like these too. Not meant to be.
customer_reviews.author: KC Hiker

customer_reviews.title: They were supremely comfortable, provided excellent foot and ankle stability (especially when ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these boots in preparation for a trip to Park City, Utah, where I knew I would be hiking frequently. I did not have a chance to break these boots in before I left, but experienced absolutely no issues while breaking them in on the trails! They were supremely comfortable, provided excellent foot and ankle stability (especially when going down rather steep and rocky inclines), and offered excellent traction. Additionally, I love that these boots aren't too heavy or bulky, which made putting them in my carry-on that much easier. Definitely recommend these boots!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They were extremely comfortable and nice and wide at the toe
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these in a 8 and they were way too roomy. I ordered these because I had previously ordered a 7.5 in Vasque Breeze 2.0 boots and they were a little snug, but i could have ordered a size 7 in these. They were extremely comfortable and nice and wide at the toe, but i ended up returning them anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Crazy narrow
customer_reviews.text: The wides were more narrow than most average width shoes. A beautiful, well made shoe for those with skinny feet.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie P.

customer_reviews.title: Decent lightweight hiking boot, run small and somewhat narrow
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for wife. She normally wears a 7.5 to 8 wide. I ordered an 8 wide. When they arrived, we could tell they had been tried on before. She said her toes were jammed against the end of the boot. So yes, these must run small. She said they were slightly wide, not as much as expected either. We had to send them back.
customer_reviews.author: Sheepdog

customer_reviews.title: felt great. If I could get them in 10
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear 9.5 so I opted for a 10 and they were still too snug in the toes. I guess I need a wider "box" in the front of the shoes. The cushioning below, however, felt great. If I could get them in 10.5, they would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Perla C

customer_reviews.title: I Love these hiking boots
customer_reviews.text: I Love these hiking boots. My previous boots were Merrells and I grew to hate them. I can wear these all day with no discomfort, with the Merells I couldn't wait to get them off! I have a long middle toe which can be a problem with shoes like Keens, but not with these. Taking the Merrells to the hospice shop today! They are popular, but just not for me!
customer_reviews.author: Likes Books A Lot

customer_reviews.title: A little narrow
customer_reviews.text: I like the lightness of these boots, great for summer hiking and the colors are great. However as other people have stated they run a little narrow, I am hoping they will stretch a little. But we hike pretty much every day and I wear them a lot if it's not wet out, so I would recommend them to people that have a little narrower foot than I do.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer phillip

customer_reviews.title: Not for people with high insteps
customer_reviews.text: These seem like nice shoes, but they did not fit me correctly. I have a high instep and a slightly wide foot, so I purchased an 8 wide. The length and width were fine, but the shoe was too tight over the top of my foot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light and Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Light and comfortable. No break in needed. But, it runs narrow so should size up. I have sized up and glad I did and only wear regular socks.
customer_reviews.author: Pipearl

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots! The first pair I ordered on Amazon Prime ended up in Lubbock, Texas, instead of Michigan! I was anxious to get them quickly to walk in them for awhile before a trip to Big Bend National Park in Texas. I called Amazon immediately and they overnited a new pair immediately. So I have had them over a week to break them in and they are so comfortable. I ordered 1/2 size bigger than my usual size. Great boots!
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Quality for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Really nice boot for the price. Should not have listened to other reviews about running small as I ordered 1/2 size larger than shoe size and they were very large. Too wide also and had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: John P Parke Jr

customer_reviews.title: Love these!!
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and so comfortable. I wore these without breaking them in and on our 3 hour hike in the mountains my feet were so comfortable. They didn't cut into my feet or ankles at all. Great traction while walking a steep mountain. The color is great also. Love them!!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and light
customer_reviews.text: Love them! Perfect fit and I have feet that like adequate room and to be comfortable. They feel and look nice, not clunky as hikers can be. Tough, lightweight and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: K.O.

customer_reviews.title: Order a size up!
customer_reviews.text: I love these I really do. I work outside most of the time and have to walk a lot and usually I find myself with aching feet. I've bought these and am comfortable all day. Best part is that unlike other shoes my feet don't feel hot in these (i live in Florida and the heat on pavement can be awful). The only downside is that these do run a bit small. I'm a size 10 but decide to go up a half size just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela

customer_reviews.title: Looked and felt great! Felt like a sturdy boot
customer_reviews.text: Looked and felt great! Felt like a sturdy boot, but still felt light and not too heavy. Was a bit snug though. If I wanted to wear thick socks with them, they would be too tight. I am usually a size 9 shoe, and this order was a 9.5. I plan to return them for a size 10.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Davis

customer_reviews.title: VERSATILE SUMMER SHOE !!!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic summer hiking/walking shoe. Extremely comfortable, very light-weight, and waterproof. Great color combinations too!
customer_reviews.author: Gini Lisanti

customer_reviews.title: Love the wide toe box for my bunion
customer_reviews.text: Love the wide toe box for my bunion. I am not experiencing any rubbing or discomfort. Comfortable out of the box with only minor stiffness around the ankle but that was short lived. I just finished walking 9 miles on City streets and my feet feel great!
customer_reviews.author: D Cadman

customer_reviews.title: Fine for the price, but colors are straight from 1992
customer_reviews.text: Kind of a cheap end version than you would purchase in a store but did the trick for the price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are the best on the planet
customer_reviews.text: These are the best on the planet. They have helped my friend walk in a capacity that she has not experienced in years. She is very limited by plantar fasciitis and does not get out much. These boots have changed her life.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Heiner

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for one-day hikes!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a replacement for some 'Expensive' hiking boots for my wife; these were winners by far as they felt comfortable right out of the box and more importantly, no toe blisters while hiking!
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Knee

customer_reviews.title: Quality of construction and comfort of footwear is rapid with Vasque.
customer_reviews.text: I wore them around the house ,on carpets, to ascertain whether they were what I wanted, because they are a new model for me of Vasque. They are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: victoria

customer_reviews.title: Great but ORDER A HALF A SIZE LARGER
customer_reviews.text: Just got these in the mail today. I love the look and the feel, they are very light! However ORDER A HALF A SIZE LARGER!!!!!!! I always wear size 9, but these are *snug* in 9 for me and a 9.5 would be ideal and more comfortable but for whatever reason the 9.5 is $30 more than the size 9 so I will be keeping the 9 due to not wanting to pay more. I wish I would of listen to the comments about ordering a half size larger!!
customer_reviews.author: JeanMari Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Great Hiking Boot
customer_reviews.text: Very nice boot and fits good but I had gone to a local store and tried on the Vasque, though they did not have this particular model which I had researched and was listed as the best hiking boot for 2017. I read reviews and all said they fit small and wear an 8-8/12 so I ordered a 9 and probably could have worn 9 1/2 but will just wear thinner sock for now until they stretch a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Jean O'Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Great looking, sturdy and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great looking and sturdy. They do run 1/2 size small, which I wanted room for thicker socks if needed so I ordered 1 while size up. I wear a size 9 and ordered a 10 which are perfect for my use.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Thorsland

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Great hiking shoes. Just used them and we hiked up a steep trail for total of 4.2 miles and my feet never hurt going up or down.
customer_reviews.author: Girls Mom

customer_reviews.title: Love the shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoes. I have not been on long hikes yet but on my 3 mile walks in the park they have been great. Right amount of support for my ankles.
customer_reviews.author: clementine lockhart

customer_reviews.title: Working great for me
customer_reviews.text: Bought these after my previous hiking boots were falling apart on me. I bought a size a little larger than what I normally wear, but was confident in buying the size I did since my previous hiking boots were also Vasque. It has been serving me well.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Hays

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise liked shoe style
customer_reviews.text: Returned because it was a not wide enough. Of the 3 Vasque ordered in wide only one was truly wide enough for my foot. Otherwise liked shoe style.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: A Vasque Newbie !
customer_reviews.text: As a Keen boot woman for years, I do believe I will be a Vasque boot woman moving forward. Will say that initially they felt snug when I first put them on (wear 7, ordered 7), after wearing them a couple of days in the house... they became very comfortable, love the ankle support. Great lightweight boot for any activity for the price... as for waterproof, don't know yet ;)
customer_reviews.author: Lauren O’Hara

customer_reviews.title: These are beautiful boots. I usually wear a size 9 but ...
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful boots. I usually wear a size 9 but I had to trade up to a size 10. Love them now that I have the right size!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny C

customer_reviews.title: The fit is great, super comfortable to wear all day exploring
customer_reviews.text: The fit is great, super comfortable to wear all day exploring. I usually wear a size 6 in Vasque, but the half size up in these is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Kacie44

customer_reviews.title: Shoes are NOT water proof as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: These sneakers are sold as water proof but they are not. I am so disappointed. I should have returned them but I was too lazy. Spent 90some Dollars on these and have to throw them out. I could cry.
customer_reviews.author: Gudrun Klemens

customer_reviews.title: I have been wearing them nonstop around NYC and I am so comfortable in them
customer_reviews.text: DISCLAIMER: I have yet to go hiking in these boots. I bought them for a trip I'm taking to Montana this week. I have been wearing them nonstop around NYC and I am so comfortable in them. I usually wear a 8.5 so I got a 9 to be safe and they feel great. They are very light despite being boots. Great support - haven't rolled my ankle yet in them. Will update post trip!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: I returned these in favor of the Keen, but I loved these too!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoe, just a little small and snug. I normally wear an 8 - 8.5 but these were small still.
customer_reviews.author: G. Araneda

customer_reviews.title: Get a half size bigger
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes, wish I had gotten them in half a size bigger, definitely killed my big toes when I did a long hiking trip with a lot of downhill
customer_reviews.author: Fariba J.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Boot
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a trip to Alaska. We experienced all types of weather and terrain and I was always comfortable in these boots. Love them!!!
customer_reviews.author: karla

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: a little narrow, even for a wide width, functions well on the trail
customer_reviews.author: Short one

customer_reviews.title: Great fit !
customer_reviews.text: Perfect as I realize most boots run small. I picked the size correctly and they fit like gold! Comfy right out of the box....great product!
customer_reviews.author: Marcia R.

customer_reviews.title: Solid boots
customer_reviews.text: These hiking boots are great. They do run a half size small as everyone has said, but I didn't pay attention and had to return and reorder. They will feel narrow and tight at first but stretch out quickly--I had to adjust my laces in the middle of my first hike. Super leightweight and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for dual purpose.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these boots for good support (hiking in the Alps) and casual wear (sightseeing in southern Italy) on the same trip. After wearing them for the first time on an all-day hike, I think they will work out well.
customer_reviews.author: Kaz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the wide and we are glad we did. This is an extremely comfortable boot.
customer_reviews.author: MVL

customer_reviews.title: The most comfortable shoes I own
customer_reviews.text: The most comfortable shoes I own! Hiked all over the Galápagos and Machu Picchu and my feet felt like they could keep going even at the end of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Goslin

customer_reviews.title: Great Hiking Boots!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these shoes! This is the first time I actually purchased shoes for hiking instead of just wearing my normal sneakers. Just took these to the Cook Forest State Park and hiked for the weekend and they held up perfectly! Other than the normal ache of just being on your feet my feet didn't bother me and they felt fine the next day. Great support for the ankle, which was something I was concerned about. I highly reccomend these and will continue to get these for years to come!
customer_reviews.author: Leann

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Get a half size up My favorite boots. I wear them nearly every day
customer_reviews.author: Shayla

customer_reviews.title: ... hiking boots and found these to be the most comfortable. I have relatively narrow feet and med-high arch
customer_reviews.text: I tried on a bunch of hiking boots and found these to be the most comfortable. I have relatively narrow feet and med-high arch.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon M Harrington

customer_reviews.title: ... worn for about 10 miles so far but feel comfortable. I usually wear 7
customer_reviews.text: Have only worn for about 10 miles so far but feel comfortable. I usually wear 7.5 - 8 shoe and purchased 8.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable, excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: very comfortable, excellent quality. I ordered them a half size larger than what I normally wear and they fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: CFultz

customer_reviews.title: But very comfortable. Feel almost like a trainer
customer_reviews.text: This boot runs small. Order a half size up! But very comfortable. Feel almost like a trainer, and very nice cushion for my flat feet. Although it's a boot, it still has a nice, lower profile with good ankle support
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy, no support!
customer_reviews.text: I had worn serveral pairs of the Vasque women's Vista and loved them. When they were discontinued I contacted Vasque customer service and ask what would be the closest replacement. They recommended the Monolith. Comparing the 2 styles is like comparing apples to orangutans. The Monolith is flimsy with no support. Reminds me a bit of the old 70s era converse sneakers. Too bad the old Vista was a solid 5 star boot.😒
customer_reviews.author: lifeisbetteratthebeach

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes, but slightly narrow
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes, but slightly narrow, and I sized up a half size after reading the reviews. Good ankle support and nice looking boot.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Boots, Not for Narrow Feet
customer_reviews.text: I returned these for the Inhaler II, I have narrow feet with high instep and high arch. I could not cinch the boots tight enough, my foot kept sliding forward and side to side. The Inhaler fits much better for me
customer_reviews.author: CiCi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit, light... excellent!!! And delivered so quick... Great experience
customer_reviews.author: Geraldine Walker

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable! A little smaller than I expected. But extremely sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great boot!
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots. I wore them for a 5 mile hike to break them in and had no blisters at the end. I typically wear a 7.5 in athletic shoes and boot, but since I have wider feet I ordered a size 8.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: she liked them, she doesn't enjoy the outdoors
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter to use hiking in Yosemite, she liked them, she doesn't enjoy the outdoors , so she doesn't love anything xdealing with the outdoors. They were very light and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: melissa Bohmer

customer_reviews.title: ... them on I would say that they are a good fit. I bought them 1/2 size larger then ...
customer_reviews.text: I haven't worn these boots on a hike yet but trying them on I would say that they are a good fit. I bought them 1/2 size larger then my usual size to allow plenty of room for thicker socks and toe room.
customer_reviews.author: avonale

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Tried these out yesterday and they did great on their maiden voyage.
customer_reviews.author: Lois McCluskey

customer_reviews.title: Went up 1/2 size to accommodate hiking socks. Felt ...
customer_reviews.text: Went up 1/2 size to accommodate hiking socks. Felt a little cold snow shoeing at 28 degrees. But overall very comfy. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: esad

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: This seems like a nice boot but unlike other vasque products I have had, this was disappointingly small.
customer_reviews.author: glad

customer_reviews.title: they have stretched a little and now fit comfortably. These are my new go to shoes for ...
customer_reviews.text: Although they're smaller than expected, they have stretched a little and now fit comfortably. These are my new go to shoes for outdoor activities. I'm glad I bought them before winter storm Stella slammed the northeast.
customer_reviews.author: Sara L.

customer_reviews.title: They provided good support for my 2 week trip
customer_reviews.text: wore them to Africa. They provided good support for my 2 week trip.
customer_reviews.author: Geeman

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: I wore to hiking after the raining day and it kept my feet dry and good support. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla

product_meta.title: Vasque Women's Monolith Hiking Boot
product_meta.description:
Like a jack-of-all-trades, the monolith takes every job in stride. Loose, rocky trail, no problem - an ethylene vinyl acetate footbed and midsole provide cushioning and protection. The monolith mid features an ultradry waterproofing system, keeping you dry all the way back to the trailhead. Mid-cut ankle support for rough terrain and 1.8mm leather for durability.

At Vasque, they are committed to making functional, innovative and aesthetic footwear that performs to the highest standards. Their ultimate goal is to make shoes that inspire you to get outdoors and embark on an adventure. Incorporating and developing new and innovative technologies into their boots is what keeps Vasque at the top of their game.
feature_bullets: Dual density ethylene vinyl acetate footbed
